page.title: 09An Important Event.
page.content: Stainforth Gala was revived after many years absence, by local groups, (i.e.schools, Youth Club, Rate Payer's Association etc).The Gala is held in July on the Welfare grounds. It starts in the morning with the judging of fancy dress, decorated cars ,bicycles and lorries. The Gala Queen and children's band lead a parade round the village, ending at the Welfare grounds. Side shows and stalls surround a centre ring where displays and demonstrations take place. Gymnastics,judo,model aircraft knockouts, five a side football, children's and family races,tug-of-war can be seen,with all the fun of the fair.
